summary: Through many years of working in the field of development and international cooperation, I gained an excellent ability to refine negotiation skills, manage different work teams, develop teamwork skills, and manage multiple projects at the same time. Furthermore, the academic achievement that has been achieved has also helped in developing the skills of scientific research, exploration, analysis, and experimentation to achieve innovation and problem-solving methods, in addition to developing knowledge skills in diverse cultures related to the international business manager specialized in international management and Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) and market internalization.

company.name: Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation

profile_positions.company: Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation
profile_positions.description: 1.Coordination of economic and technical cooperation with regional and international economic organizations, agencies and institutions specialized in the fields of investment, credit and financial and in-kind assistance. 2.Organizing, preparing and participating on negotiations with regional and international organizations, agencies and funding institutions. Follow up on the implementation of concluded agreements and periodic programs agreed upon and fulfilling local obligations and commitments, and evaluating their achievements and results. 4.Working on developing relations with regional and international organizations, agencies and funding institutions specialized in the fields of investment, credit, and financial and in-kind assistance, in order to benefit from any new assistance programs, in coordination with the public departments in the project programming sector of the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation and the sectors at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and notify the concerned authorities in the country. 5.Consultation and discussion with regional and international organizations and funding institutions on the government's development orientations and priorities to reach a mutual understanding and a common vision for directing and distributing the available funding sources on the priorities in the various development sectors. 6.Preparing regular reports and data on the activities and achievements of the sources, making recommendations regarding the search for new financing windows, determining ways to benefit from them, the conditions and criteria for financing requirements, and searching for a mechanism to activate and develop the mechanism of cooperation with these sources. 7.Participate in following up the activities and procedures resulting from Yemen's membership in some of these organizations and financial institutions with the relevant authorities.
